de.pjog.prinzJuliano.TerminalRPG.views

Interface View

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractView, CrashDialog, Dialog, EndCardView, MainMenuView, NewGameView

    public interface View
    Any view that gets drawn and handled by Storyboard
    Author:
    PrinzJuliano

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(Storyboard story,
          com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2.WindowBasedTextGUI textGUI)
        Initialize all the components for a working GUI.
        Parameters:
        story - the storyboard needed for view switching and other story related elements.
        textGUI - the GUI to draw to

      • init

        void init(Storyboard story,
          com.googlecode.lanterna.gui2.WindowBasedTextGUI textGUI,
          java.lang.String communication)
        Set the communication string (usually of type JSONObject) and call init(Storyboard, WindowBasedTextGUI)
        Parameters:
        story - the storyboard
        textGUI - the GUI to draw to
        communication - all the information for the view to enable cross view interaction.

        Returns:
